name: Mythoria
description: In blockchain gaming scenarios, the primary use of the Mythoria token is as an in-game transaction medium. Players can use Mythoria to purchase in-game items, character skins, digital assets (NFTs), and more, forming a distributed ledger-based player market. Simultaneously, the platform also uses Mythoria as participation rewards to incentivize active users, content creators, and developers, achieving self-driven ecosystem growth.
